desc: “Even though I’ve worked with these systems for years, I found new ways of looking at several topics that make them easier to remember and use. For someone new to 3D programming, it is extremely useful-it gives them a solid background in pretty much every area they need to understand.” -Peter Lipson, Toys for Bob, Inc.

details.authors: James M. Van Verth, Lars M. Bishop

title: Essential Mathematics for Games and Interactive Applications: A Programmer’s Guide (Morgan Kaufmann Series in Interactive 3D Technology)
